message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a unique and valuable item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $200.
Hi Alice, I appreciate the offer, but $200 is a bit more than I'm willing to spend right now. Would you be willing to go down to $120? I'm really interested in this product, but that's my top limit.

Hi Bob, I understand your concerns about the price, but I'm still confident that this product is worth more than $120. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $180. It's a fair price considering the value it brings, and I think you'll be happy with the purchase.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down, but $180 is still a bit too high for me.  I'm willing to go up to $150.  If you can meet me there, I'm sure we can make a deal.

Hi Bob, I understand that you're trying to get the best deal, and I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway. However, I'm still not willing to sell the product for $150. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $160. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, and I think it's still a great value for the product.
